blocks.name: 1t10e1p1e11
blocks.content: 11 is 1 times 10 to the power of 1, plus 1. (Contributed by AV, 4-Aug-2020.) (Revised by AV, 9-Sep-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm 1t10e1p1e11() {
  |- wceq(cdc(nat1, nat1), co(co(nat1, cmul, co(cdc(nat1, nat0), cexp, nat1)), caddc, nat1))
} = {
  eqtri(cdc(nat1, nat1), co(co(nat1, cmul, co(cdc(nat1, nat0), cexp, nat1)), caddc, nat1), co(co(cdc(nat1, nat0), cmul, nat1), caddc, nat1))
  dfdec10(nat1, nat1)
  oveq1i(co(cdc(nat1, nat0), cmul, nat1), caddc, nat1, co(nat1, cmul, co(cdc(nat1, nat0), cexp, nat1)))
  mulcomli(cdc(nat1, nat0), nat1, co(nat1, cmul, co(cdc(nat1, nat0), cexp, nat1)))
  ax-1cn()
  oveq2i(nat1, cmul, cdc(nat1, nat0), co(cdc(nat1, nat0), cexp, nat1))
  eqcomi(cdc(nat1, nat0), co(cdc(nat1, nat0), cexp, nat1))
  ax-mp(wceq(co(cdc(nat1, nat0), cexp, nat1), cdc(nat1, nat0)), wcel(cdc(nat1, nat0), cc))
  nncni(cdc(nat1, nat0))
  10nn()
  exp1(cdc(nat1, nat0))
}

blocks.name: deccarry
blocks.content: Add 1 to a 2 digit number with carry. This is a special case of ~ decsucc , but in closed form. As observed by ML, this theorem allows for carrying the 1 down multiple decimal constructors, so we can carry the 1 multiple times down a multi-digit number, e.g. by applying this theorem three times we get ` ( ; ; 9 9 9 + 1 ) = ; ; ; 1 0 0 0 ` . (Contributed by AV, 4-Aug-2020.) (Revised by ML, 8-Aug-2020.) (Proof shortened by AV, 10-Sep-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm deccarry(class c0) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cn), wceq(co(cdc(c0, nat9), caddc, nat1), cdc(co(c0, caddc, nat1), nat0)))
} = {
  syl5req(co(cdc(c0, nat9), caddc, nat1), cdc(co(c0, caddc, nat1), nat0), co(co(co(nat9, caddc, nat1), cmul, co(c0, caddc, nat1)), caddc, nat0), wcel(c0, cn))
  df-dec(co(c0, caddc, nat1), nat0)
  eqtrd(co(co(co(nat9, caddc, nat1), cmul, co(c0, caddc, nat1)), caddc, nat0), co(cdc(c0, nat9), caddc, nat1), co(co(nat9, caddc, nat1), cmul, co(c0, caddc, nat1)), wcel(c0, cn))
  addid1d(co(co(nat9, caddc, nat1), cmul, co(c0, caddc, nat1)), wcel(c0, cn))
  nncnd(co(co(nat9, caddc, nat1), cmul, co(c0, caddc, nat1)), wcel(c0, cn))
  nnmulcld(co(nat9, caddc, nat1), co(c0, caddc, nat1), wcel(c0, cn))
  peano2nn(c0)
  eqtrd(co(co(nat9, caddc, nat1), cmul, co(c0, caddc, nat1)), co(cdc(c0, nat9), caddc, nat1), co(co(co(nat9, caddc, nat1), cmul, c0), caddc, co(co(nat9, caddc, nat1), cmul, nat1)), wcel(c0, cn))
  adddid(co(nat9, caddc, nat1), c0, nat1, wcel(c0, cn))
  nncn(c0)
  eqtrd(co(co(co(nat9, caddc, nat1), cmul, c0), caddc, co(co(nat9, caddc, nat1), cmul, nat1)), co(cdc(c0, nat9), caddc, nat1), co(co(co(nat9, caddc, nat1), cmul, c0), caddc, co(nat9, caddc, nat1)), wcel(c0, cn))
  oveq2d(co(co(nat9, caddc, nat1), cmul, c0), caddc, co(co(nat9, caddc, nat1), cmul, nat1), co(nat9, caddc, nat1), wcel(c0, cn))
  mulid1d(co(nat9, caddc, nat1), wcel(c0, cn))
  a1i(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(co(nat9, caddc, nat1), cc))
  nncni(co(nat9, caddc, nat1))
  syl5req(co(co(co(nat9, caddc, nat1), cmul, c0), caddc, co(nat9, caddc, nat1)), co(cdc(c0, nat9), caddc, nat1), co(co(co(co(nat9, caddc, nat1), cmul, c0), caddc, nat9), caddc, nat1), wcel(c0, cn))
  oveq1i(cdc(c0, nat9), caddc, nat1, co(co(co(nat9, caddc, nat1), cmul, c0), caddc, nat9))
  df-dec(c0, nat9)
  addassd(co(co(nat9, caddc, nat1), cmul, c0), nat9, nat1, wcel(c0, cn))
  nncnd(co(co(nat9, caddc, nat1), cmul, c0), wcel(c0, cn))
  nnmulcld(co(nat9, caddc, nat1), c0, wcel(c0, cn))
  a1i(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(co(nat9, caddc, nat1), cn))
  ax-mp(wcel(co(nat9, caddc, nat1), cn), wcel(nat9, cn))
  peano2nn(nat9)
  id(wcel(c0, cn))
  a1i(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(nat9, cc))
  nncni(nat9)
  9nn()
  1cnd(wcel(c0, cn))
}
